    • Uses of Texture in sage.scene

      Methods in sage.scene that return Texture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Texture Leaf.getTexture()
      This method is intended to return the Texture object currently attached to this sage.scene.Leaf, if any.
      Texture SkyBox.getTexture(SkyBox.Face face) 
      Methods in sage.scene with parameters of type Texture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SkyBox.setTexture(SkyBox.Face face, Texture texture)
      Sets the texture to be displayed on the given face of the SkyBox, replacing any existing texture on that face.
      void SkyBox.setTexture(SkyBox.Face face, Texture texture, int textureUnit)
      Sets the texture to be displayed on the given face of the SkyBox.
      void Leaf.setTexture(Texture texture)
      Attaches the specified Texture to this Leaf.

      Methods in sage.scene.state that return Texture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Texture TextureState.getTexture()
      getTexture() gets the Texture that is assigned to the first texture unit.
      Texture TextureState.getTexture(int textureUnit)
      getTexture() retrieves the texture being used by this TextureState in the specified texture unit.
      Methods in sage.scene.state with parameters of type Texture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TextureState.setTexture(Texture texture)
      Sets the Texture object to be used by this TextureState.
      void TextureState.setTexture(Texture texture, int textureUnit)
      Assigns the specified Texture object to the specified Texture Unit in this TextureState.

    • Uses of Texture in sage.scene.state.jogl

      Methods in sage.scene.state.jogl with parameters of type Texture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void JOGLTextureState.applyFilters(Texture texture, TextureRecord texRecord, int unit, TextureStateRecord record)
      Applies the texture magnification, minification, and anisotropic filters attached to the specified Texture object to the underlying OpenGL system.
      void JOGLTextureState.applyWrap(Texture texture, TextureRecord texRecord, int unit, TextureStateRecord record)
      Check if the wrap mode of this particular texture has been changed and apply as needed.

    • Uses of Texture in sage.texture

      Subclasses of Texture in sage.texture 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Texture2D
      Texture2D subclasses Texture to represent a concrete 2D texture.
      Methods in sage.texture that return Texture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Texture Texture2D.createSimpleClone()
      Returns a clone of this Texture2D.
      abstract Texture Texture.createSimpleClone() 
      Texture Texture2D.createSimpleClone(Texture rVal)
      Returns a clone of this Texture2D, storing the cloned values in the specified Texture object.
      Texture Texture.createSimpleClone(Texture rVal)
      Retrieve a basic clone of this Texture (ie, clone everything but the image data, which is shared).
      static Texture TextureManager.findCachedTexture(TextureKey textureKey) 
      static Texture TextureManager.loadTexture2D(java.io.InputStream instream)
      Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified InputStream and using default values for the Texture.MinificationFilter and Texture.MagnificationFilter settings.
      static Texture TextureManager.loadTexture2D(java.io.InputStream instream, Texture.MinificationFilter minFilter, Texture.MagnificationFilter magFilter)
      Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified InputStream and using the specified Texture.MinificationFilter and and Texture.MagnificationFilter modes.
      static Texture TextureManager.loadTexture2D(java.lang.String fileName)
      Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified file and using default values for the Texture.MinificationFilter and Texture.MagnificationFilter settings.
      static Texture TextureManager.loadTexture2D(java.lang.String fileName, Texture.MinificationFilter minFilter, Texture.MagnificationFilter magFilter)
      Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified file and using the specified Texture.MinificationFilter and and Texture.MagnificationFilter modes.
      static Texture TextureManager.loadTexture2D(java.net.URL url)
      Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified URL and using default values for the Texture.MinificationFilter and Texture.MagnificationFilter settings.
      static Texture TextureManager.loadTexture2D(java.net.URL url, Texture.MinificationFilter minFilter, Texture.MagnificationFilter magFilter)
      Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified URL and using the specified Texture.MinificationFilter and and Texture.MagnificationFilter modes.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
